head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CLARKE, DORIS WHITE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CLARKE, DORIS WHITE

block.p: CLARKE-Doris White, on Sat. Oct. 28, 2000 in Greenwich, CT. Wife of the late Lewis A. Clarke, mother of Pete Clarke of Hingham, MA, Vicky Linville of Rowayton, CT & Debbie Moderow of Anchorage, AK, grandmother of six, Outstanding Woman Flyfisher, dedicated gardener. In lieu of flowers please send contributions to the Atlantic Salmon Federation, Box 429 St. Andrews, New Brunswick, Canada EOG2XO, or The Alaska Conservation Foundation, 441 W. Fifth Avenue, Anchorage, AK. 99501.
